USBHIDDevice Plugin v1.1.0.1

Document version: 1.0.0.1

Author(s): Sven Gijsen

Date: Juli 2015

Introduction

This plugin provides...

Plug-in script access

An object of the USBHIDDevice plugin can be created using the following script command:

var objUSBHIDDevice = new USBHIDDevice();

You can use this object to access all functions provided by the USBHIDDevice plugin. A list of all available functions can be found in the doxygen's reference documentation.
